meanings.sent1: The charcoaly drawing of the tree looked realistic.
meanings.sent2: The grilled meat had a charcoaly flavor.
meanings.sent3: The artist used a charcoaly touch to create a dramatic effect.
meanings.sent4: The sky turned a charcoaly hue as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The charcoaly clouds loomed ominously overhead.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of charcoal.
meanings.sent1: The charcoaly texture of the fabric felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The charcoaly smell of the fire filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The charcoaly taste of the burnt marshmallow made her grimace.
meanings.sent4: His charcoaly voice was deep and gravelly.
meanings.sent5: The charcoaly residue left marks on his hands after cleaning the grill.
